ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nnnn0 | |- ( N e. NN -> N e. NN0 ) |
| 2 |  | #P_repsw | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( S repeatS N ) e. Word V ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> ( S repeatS N ) e. Word V ) |
| 4 |  | #P_lsw | |- ( ( S repeatS N ) e. Word V -> ( lastS ` ( S repeatS N ) ) = ( ( S repeatS N ) ` ( ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) - 1 ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> ( lastS ` ( S repeatS N ) ) = ( ( S repeatS N ) ` ( ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) - 1 ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> S e. V ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> N e. NN0 ) |
| 8 |  | #P_repswlen | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) = N ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) = N ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> ( ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) - 1 ) = ( N - 1 ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fzo0end | |- ( N e. NN -> ( N - 1 ) e. ( 0 ..^ N ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> ( N - 1 ) e. ( 0 ..^ N ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> ( ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) - 1 ) e. ( 0 ..^ N ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_repswsymb | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN0 /\ ( ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) - 1 ) e. ( 0 ..^ N ) ) -> ( ( S repeatS N ) ` ( ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) - 1 ) ) = S ) |
| 15 | 6, 7, 13, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> ( ( S repeatS N ) ` ( ( # ` ( S repeatS N ) ) - 1 ) ) = S ) |
| 16 | 5, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( S e. V /\ N e. NN ) -> ( lastS ` ( S repeatS N ) ) = S ) |
